action - Variable in class core.Activity
the action of the activity - 'IN' / 'OUT'
activities - Variable in class core.Pass
the ticket's List of activities History
Activity - Class in core
Class -- Activity - represents a ticket's activity
Activity(Pass, String, Date, Station, Line) - Constructor for class core.Activity
full constructor
activityActions - Static variable in class utils.Constants
the available options for an Activity action
activityDateAndTime - Variable in class core.Activity
the activity date & time occur Primary Key
addActivity(Activity) - Method in class core.Pass
Add a new activity for this ticket
addLine(Line) - Method in class core.Station
add new line to this station
addLine(Integer, String) - Method in class core.TheCarmelit
This method creates and adds a new Line to the Carmelit IFF it is not already exist and IFF all line details are valid (not null and more than 0) and IFF line color is valid (check the line color after creating the new Line if not null)
addPassenger(Integer, String) - Method in class core.TheCarmelit
This method creates and adds a new Passenger to the Carmelit IFF it is not already exist and IFF all passengers details are valid (not null and more than 0)
addStation(Integer, String) - Method in class core.TheCarmelit
This method creates and adds a new Station to the Carmelit IFF it is not already exist and IFF all station details are valid (not null and more than 0)
addStationAndRideFare(Station, Double) - Method in class core.Line
this method add a new station which this line go through and save the given fare for the ride in this line from this station notice that a Map cannot hold 2 identical keys notice to check if the given station is not already in this line Map if you won't check it, then the new Key will ran over the current station Key and the "old" fare will be lost.
addTicket(Pass) - Method in class core.Passenger
add a new ticket for this set IFF it's not already exist and IFF the given ticket's code is valid!
allActivitiesBetweenGivenDates(Date, Date) - Method in class core.TheCarmelit
This query return a list of all Activities made Between 2 Given Dates accordingly to the startDate and endDate given, return a list only of the activities happened between this dates.
allTicketsOrderByBalance() - Method in class core.TheCarmelit
This Query return a TreeSet of all tickets in use, ordered by their balance from the higher balance to the lowest balance (Descending order)
associateLineToStation(Integer, Integer, Double) - Method in class core.TheCarmelit
This method associate Line To Station IFF all details are valid (not null and more than 0) and IFF the Carmelit contains the given stationNumber & lineNumber and IFF this line and station are not already connected (the 'add' method succeed) and Notice: to roll-back (and remove) if one of the 'adds' fails
